title: Lee Sin+liss
body: If lee w's to liss but while he is traveling to her, she "teleports" to her claw location, does lee stop at origin or does he go all the way with her?

replies.body:
From memory Lee Sin will follow other units that blink/dash with his W up to a certain maximum distance (so he won't follow someone across the entire map if their teleport completes mid dash for example).

As far as whether Lee goes all the way with Liss, well, that's their own private business.

Lee is blind... I don't
Think he CAN go all the way. 

Now before you say "but muh lee senses" remember that lissandra is literally ice. So all the touchy feeling nerves and cells move super slow (because science) and he wouldn't know what to do.

However Annie is fire and fire=fast speedy as fuck cells, which is what Annie should need to
Run the hell away from the pedophile lee should he go after a child
Liss blind too :3  I think they can relate~

replies.poster: J E B A Å‚ T E D

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AbORFXzk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-09T06:50:20.909+0000)
>

> 
> As far as whether Lee goes all the way with Liss, well, that's their own private business.

this
Well, after burning himself he had to cool off with someone >_>

I would assume that Lee Sin would travel with her, until they make contact.

Abilities that lock on to a target tend to stick with them until they are reached.

{{champion:1}}'s Q
{{champion:64}}'s second Q proc
{{champion:63}}'s R
{{champion:9}}' E
{{champion:10}} Q

for a few examples. Majority are point and click.
from my experience, lee dashes to the position which his target had **at the point of cast**

Lee does not follow anyone with W. Once it is cast, he immediately dashes to them, regardless of where they end up being while Lee Sin is traveling to them. He does not home in on them the same way his Q homes in.
